mapper.update: update shoessku set shoesid = #{shoesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, skuproperty = #{skuproperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ticketprice = #{ticketprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, skusales = #{skusales,jdbcType=INTEGER} where skuid = #{skuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select skuid, shoesid, skuproperty, price, ticketprice, quantity, skusales from shoessku
